## AssociationDefinition.targetMandatoryEnforced property

If the mandatoryness of the target of the association is enforced.

If true, data updates that would violate the requirement from [AssociationDefinition.targetMandatory](./alfresco-data-model.associationdefinition.targetmandatory.md) will be rejected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly targetMandatoryEnforced: boolean;
```
